name: InfoShow23 GameJam: Rabbit Game
description:
cultist rabbits in the magicians hat are trying to summon Satan by sacrificing their blood. You’re a magicians cat trying to prevent that by throwing magical potions at them.

Controls

Drag & Drop colored potions on rabbits

Match their colors

Delay the inevitable

Credits

Audio - Nikita

Art - Rosie

Coding - Justas
